resources.string: Login failed. Please verify your internet connection and try again. Logging in with a Google Apps email address may not work. If the error persists, please send a log to the developer.
The test push notification from your tablet to your phone failed.\n\nPlease make sure the latest version of DeskSMS is installed and running on your phone.
Your DeskSMS inbox is now loading.
TabletSMS was unable to log into your account. Please click to reauthenticate.

TabletSMS lets you send text messages from your tablet through your phone.

Before starting, please make sure that:
1) You have set up DeskSMS on your phone.
2) You installed TabletSMS on your tablet.

Done? Great! Now, let's log in with the Google account you used for DeskSMS.
All messages have been marked as read.
You do not have any Google accounts set up on this device. Please log into a Google account on your phone before continuing.
Your messages are loading. This will take a moment...
